BeeLikedDBIP.Instructions: Remember to activate it by going to System > Geolocation and selecting BeeLikedDBIP as Location Provider.
BeeLikedDBIP.PleaseGetYourAPIKeyFrom: Leave this field empty to use the free version or get your API key from db-ip.com.
BeeLikedDBIP.PleaseEnterAValidAPIKey: Please enter a valid API key.
BeeLikedDBIP.FooterInfo: This is a non-official DB-IP (db-ip.com) plugin created by BeeLiked (BeeLiked.com).
